title: Having to keep resetting my password
body: Ok so today is the second time i had to reset my password idk if its a glitch or not but when i had it the first time i put both my username and password in correctly and i tried about 20 times till i said screw it i'm just going reset it so it happened again today and i wanted to post this before i reset it the second time but i couldn't log in cause you know, so i was wondering if anyone else had this problem and what i can do next time it happens so i don't have to reset my password again thanks.

replies.body:
Someone may have access to your email and may be resetting your password without your knowledge. I strongly recommend changing your password tied to the email associated with your account and set up 2-step verification if possible. You may also want to check out [our guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) to securing your account.

Let me know if your password keeps getting changed.
Yea i think your right both of my accounts today i had to reset my password again so i changed my email password hopefully that helps thx for the help btw. :))
